detail_desc: Cropped, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail at the hem.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative bow at the hems.
Dress in a soft, denim-look Tencel™ lyocell weave with narrow elastication around the wide neckline, flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Practical travel jewellery case in grained imitation leather that folds up and fastens with a strap.Two zipped inner compartments. Two straps: one with a press-stud at one end designed to hold rings and one with eight holes designed to hold earrings. Soft velour lining. Size 21x27.5 cm.
Wide tunic in a cotton weave with an opening at the front, ties at the top and gathers at the shoulders. Tiers to the hem and long, wide balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Collar in fleece with a rounded hem and a ribbed polo neck containing glittery threads.
Jacket in a patterned weave with dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. No fasteners.
Short imitation suede skirt in a double layer at the front with eyelets and lacing. Visible zip at the back. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit lambswool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered block heels and a zip in one side. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx 7.5 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, opening front and back and buttons at the back of the neck.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Long metal earrings with velvet-covered plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 15 cm.
One-button jacket in a jacquard weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and rounded hems. Contrasting colour stripes and trims at the sides and hems.

Boxy jacket in cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, wide puff sleeves with pleats and cuffs with a concealed press-stud. Diagonal front pockets and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with contrasting colour trims around the neckline and sleeves.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Narrow, metal-chain waist belt decorated with shell-shaped beads in metal and resin. Adjustable length. Small carabiner hook at one end.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, flap front pockets and gathered 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.

Playsuit in woven fabric with decorative lace trims and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, smocking at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise at the hem, a zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and asymmetric hem with longer sides. Lined.
Short, straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill. High waist with adjustable elastication (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, back pockets and narrow hems.
Hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Wide top in thin, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, ribbed cuffs and a rolled, raw-edge hem.

Lightly padded parka in cotton canvas with a detachable, unlined hood, stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap chest and side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and elasticated cuffs. Quilted lining.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Vest top in linen slub jersey.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Short, sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave with adjustable spaghetti straps and a V-neck. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in one side, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an intarsia motif and elasticated tops.
Sleeveless, calf-length jersey dress in a modal and cotton blend with a twisted seam with a slit at the front.

V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces around the neckline that continue down the front. Yoke at the back with gathers to provide extra width, and long sleeves with a pleat and buttons at the cuffs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides.
Short, sleeveless, jacquard-patterned jersey dress in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and flared skirt.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with satin linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Wide blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a button and yoke with decorative gathers at the top. Long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool.

V-neck blouse in jacquard-weave viscose with a wrapover front that fastens with concealed ties, a hook-and-eye fastener and narrow ties at one side. Long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Thong briefs in ribbed cotton jersey with a high, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Vest tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif, contrasting colour hood and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short, A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar and buttons down the front. Short, lined puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in soft viscose jersey with a collar and short sleeves. Seam below the bust with elastication at the back and sewn-in ties at the sides. Unlined.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar and classic front. Narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Spacious handbag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top. Three inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size 15x30x36 cm.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist, side pockets and broderie anglaise at the hems.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the front, an outer compartment with a zip at the back, and two inner compartments. Adjustable waist strap with plastic fasteners. Lined. Size 5x15.5x26.5 cm.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fancy dress costume in glossy jersey with a print motif. Zip down the front with a chin guard, long sleeves, long legs and a padded detachable tail.
Slim-fit trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a glittery text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft, ribbed viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Tight fit. The top is made from recycled polyester.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in an organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit cardigan in an organic cotton blend containing glittery threads with a frill around the neckline and buttons down the front.
Oversized jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a wide, rib-knit polo neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless top in jersey that is slightly shorter at the front with a draped detail at the hem.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Off-the-shoulder top in stretch viscose jersey with wide smocking at the top and short sleeves.
Long metal earrings with plastic beads in various colours. Length 10 cm.
